sense.def:
Sleep
je naravno stanje, v katerem so naše oči zaprte, telo in um pa sta nedejavna.

seg.quote: I haven't been getting enough sleep recently.
Now go to sleep and stop worrying.

sense.def:
To sleep
pomeni počivati tako, da so naše oči zaprte, telo in um pa nedejavna in nezavestna.

seg.quote: She slept till ten in the morning.
He was so excited he could hardly sleep.
I glanced down at the sleeping figure.

sense.def:
A sleep
je obdobje, v katerem spimo.

seg.quote: You'll feel better if you have a little sleep.

sense.def:
Kadar hiša
sleeps a particular number of people
, so v njej postelje za določeno število ljudi.

seg.quote: Each apartment sleeps up to five adults.

sense.def:
Kadar dve osebi
are sleeping together
, imata spolne odnose.

Kadar del telesa
goes to sleep
, človek v njem ne čuti ničesar.

seg.quote: His foot had gone to sleep.

sense.def:
Kadar bolna ali poškodovana žival
is put to sleep
, jo usmrtijo na neboleč način.

seg.quote: Sheba had to be put to sleep.

sense.def:
To sleep around
pomeni imeti spolne odnose z več različnimi osebami v določenem obdobju;

To sleep off the effects of too much food or alcohol
pomeni s spanjem okrevati po preveč zaužite hrane ali alkohola.

seg.quote: We went back to our room to sleep it off.

sense.def:
To sleep through a noise
pomeni, da se človek, ki spi, kljub hrupu ne zbudi.
